author: Judith Potts
title: Cancer drug license restrictions are costing lives
text: Health Advice Cancer drug license restrictions are costing lives The profile of one tumour may throw up similarities to those found in a differently located tumour â€“ and those similarities could be treated the same way, if drugs were licensed differently Drugs for one type of cancer are not necessarily licensed to be used for another Photo: ALAMY
